title: Looking to get out of bronze.
body:
Looking for players who aim to improve with each game they play, and not go into a game with the mindset needing to win, because I feel as though every game I play, my teammates have that mindset about wanting to just win, which leads them to make stupid mistakes etc. 
I myself don't believe I belong in Bronze, Im just asking if anyone that is willing to play alongside me give it a shot at trying to climb our way out of bronze.
I play mostly TOP and JUNGLE, but can play MID pretty well too, and ADC and SUPPORT aren't my strongest but can still fill those rolls too.

Add me in game if you would like to embark on the same journey as me - podgyo

replies.body: Add me if you want to play with one of the best Singed players.

Hey mate I'm more than happy to play with you, I have 2 accounts both around high silver MMR but happy to play and help out/have fun. I'm no rager and just love playing with people. If keen throw me an invite "Eximiusprime" ingame!

hey mate I'm in the same boat as you wanting to improve and being in bronze and would be keen to have another person who I can play ranked with. I play mostly ADC and top and decent in jungle and mid. I have sent you a friend invite.
Hey Man would love to play with you currently in bronze aswell and looking to get out. Cant play today due to homework and a assignment due tomorrow but I would love to play tomorrow !
